description: Display and manipulate a breakdown structure of your Jira Scrum project - even offline and only eventually connected to your Jira system

jiraUrl.title: Jira URL
jiraUrl.description: This URL will be used in case you don´t provide a URL in the config section of your .bkdn file

defaultStoryPoints.title: Default Story Points
defaultStoryPoints.description: The default amount of story points to assign to new created epics or stories

foldAfterPull.title: Fold all editor lines after a successful pull

user.title: Username
user.description: The username will be used for accessing Jira

pass.title: API Token
pass.description: Provide your API Token, which will be used for accessing Jira. Though it´s possible, you should NOT store a password here! If you don´t already have an API Token, visit your Jira, sign in, and click on your Avatar icon (top right corner of the screen). Choose API Token Authentication and create yourself a token.
